name: Fishman's Last Stand
description:
Prepare yourself for a fight. The humans want your land, and they will do whatever they can to get it

Main Goal
Players must collect resources and use them to construct towers, aiming to defeat waves of humans intent on seizing their land.

Tower Defence
Consider the construction of your towers with a strategic approach, taking into account that every tower possesses advantages and vulnerabilities

Resource Management
In order to succeed, it's essential to collect resources. Collecting resources from around the world will not just improve what you can do but also give you many different things to help you reach your goals
